Posts.Content: Hi i have just joined tonight has anyone any advise or experiance please, I was dignosed last week  with a grade three and booked into hosp for a left breast masectomy on the 25th June  and have today been offered take part in a clinical trial taking the drug called aromatase inhibitors from tomorrow i have read all the litriture and wonder if any one else has taken it and have any comment i have to make a decision in the morning and am in a dilema !! thankyou Jandy
Posts.Title: help tonight please

Posts.Content: Hi Sasha, thankyou for your kind words ,i think after reading more about the drug i will go for the trial as it will help with research and will hopefully will help others in the future thank you, Jandy
Posts.Title: help tonight please

Posts.Content: thankyou for your  kind message am just trying to work my way round the site the support here is wonderful Jandy xx
Posts.Title: help tonight please

Posts.Content: Thank you so much for your reply i have just come back from hosp and decided i would go with the trial ,i did not read the letter properly thought i had already been chosen!,afraid my head has been a bit scambled since my diognosis ,didnt realize it was random but i was chosen today and to take the tablet and feel quite happy about the nurses answered a whole list of questions i had made a note of  so pleased i have joind although i have a loving suppotive family its lovely having the comfort of you all who understand (although i wish you all had not got this    )thankyou again Jandy
Posts.Title: help tonight please
